noProfessionFound: Didn't find your profession? Contact BlueSphere
deviceManageTitle: BlueSphere helps you manage Android devices in your business
quicManageDesc: Zero-contact registration can perform contactless device registration in batches, quickly deploy thousands of devices, and remotely configure the functions of Android devices in batches through configuration templates, which will take effect in real time. Simple but not simple!
